document.full_text: the controversial florida pastor banned from protesting near a detroit-area mosque says he plans to return next week for a protest aimed at the court that found him to be a risk to public safety.
document.title: florida pastor vows return to protest after ban
lines_and_colors: the controversial florida pastor banned from protesting near a detroit-area mosque says he plans to return next week for a protest aimed at the court that found him to be a risk to public safety.
